actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to approve an authorization for upgrading and construction work on highways in the State of West Virginia.

summary.text: Expresses the intention of the Senate to approve, as part of a surface transportation law to be enacted in 1991, an authorization for the construction or upgrading of specified highways in West Virginia.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to approve an authorization for upgrading and construction work on highways in the State of West Virginia.
